DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: New York Court Dismisses Bid to Stop Electric_Cars : The Empire_State can continue with its California-style plan to set stringent emissions standards for motor_vehicles , including a requirement for electric_cars , the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of New York ruled . Ford Motor Co. , Chrysler Corp . and General Motors Co . had argued that the plan would force them to make special cars just for_sale in New York . The auto_makers have proposed one low-emission design for the California market and another for the other states .
